1.title: Virginia Madsen

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Marie Osmond

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Marie makes lemon cheesecake. Govind shares is cooking background and makes buttermilk and sweet potato panna cotta.

3.title: Leeza Gibbons

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Leeza bakes her "Crisis Chocolate Cake"; Govind makes individual flour less chocolate cakes and sweet potato bars. Catherine Von Ruden of EOS Chocolates makes chocolate covered almonds.

4.title: Holly Robinson Peete

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Holly makes macaroni and cheese; Garvind makes cheese fondue and pretzel-crusted chicken drummettes. Kippy Miller shares the advantages of honey over sugar.

5.title: Penn Jillette

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Penn Jillette makes beef hamburgers and curly fired. Govind Armstrong shares his inspirations from farmers' markets and then makes a turkey burger with kale chips and a bison burger with twice-bakes steak fries.

6.title: Tim Conway

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Tim Conway makes Chicken Tarragon; Chef Scoot Roark of Meals on Wheels makes chicken pot pies; actress Linda Grey visits Meals on Wheels in Richmond, Virginia.

7.title: Maria Menounos

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Maria shares her family recipe for Pastitsio; Govind makes individual butternut squash lasagnas; actress Mariette Hartley volunteers with Meals on Wheels in Kissimee, Florida.

8.title: Leonard Maltin

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Leonard makes tomato soup and grilled cheese. Govind makes gazpacho, eggplant paninis, and tomato and fennel soup; Kippy Miller discusses the benefits of almond milk.

9.title: Joe Mantegna

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Joe Mantenga makes Pasta Fagioli and Govind makes Branzino al Cartoccio. Jodi Korelitz makes healthy snack bars.

10.title: Christopher Knight

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Christopher makes pork chops and curry and ginger apple sauce. Govind makes a variation with pork loin with pear stuffing, and stops by the farmer's market to talk about the nutrition of sprouts.

11.title: Fran Drescher

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Fran makes black bean burgers; Chef Sonny Sonnhalter of Meals on Wheels makes a lentil loaf.

12.title: Robert Wagner

episode of.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: RJ makes Pasta a la Checca; Kippy Miller makes sorbet; Govind discusses 'companion growing' and makes Rosemary and Thyme RaCk of Lamb with mashed root vegetables and Meyer Lemon Semifreddo.

imdb.plot outline: "Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson combines three fabulous ingredients - America's Favorite Mom Florence Henderson, renowned professional Chef Govind Armstrong and a fabulous parade of celebrities who whip up the best recipes they've ever made. Florence's celebrity friends, Virginia Madsen, Marie Osmond, Leeza Gibbons, Holly Robinson Peete, Penn Jillette, Tim Conway, Maria Menounos, Leonard Maltin, Joe Mantegna, Christopher Knight, Fran Drescher and last but certainly not least, Robert Wagner, stop by and share personal and poignant stories with viewers while they cook their favorite recipe and tell the inspiration behind the recipe. From family favorites to great party dishes, the celebrity guests will share recipes that they love to prepare but may need "reinvention." Chef Govind Armstrong, along with a couple Meals on Wheels Chef's step in and give these Celebrity favorites a "healthier" twist that all are sure to enjoy.
imdb.title: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson
akas: Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson (United States)
plot: "_Who's Cooking with Florence Henderson_ (qv) combines three fabulous ingredients - America's Favorite Mom Florence Henderson, renowned professional Chef Govind Armstrong and a fabulous parade of celebrities who whip up the best recipes they've ever made. Florence's celebrity friends, Virginia Madsen, Marie Osmond, Leeza Gibbons, Holly Robinson Peete, Penn Jillette, Tim Conway, Maria Menounos, Leonard Maltin, Joe Mantegna, Christopher Knight, Fran Drescher and last but certainly not least, Robert Wagner, stop by and share personal and poignant stories with viewers while they cook their favorite recipe and tell the inspiration behind the recipe. From family favorites to great party dishes, the celebrity guests will share recipes that they love to prepare but may need "reinvention." Chef Govind Armstrong, along with a couple Meals on Wheels Chef's step in and give these Celebrity favorites a "healthier" twist that all are sure to enjoy.::RLTV [us]
